metadata.title: CVE-2020-17507 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Qt through 5.12.9, and 5.13.x through 5.15.xbefore 5.15.1. read_xbm_body in gui/image/qxbmhandler.cpp has a bufferover-read.

criterions.comment: qtbase-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
qt4-x11: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
